subject: PROPOSAL FOR VIDEO REVIEW PRODUCTION
description_text:
Good afternoon, Simsonn team, My name is Agustin Conde, member of
TecnoCardales. I would like to present a proposal for a video about the
Simsonn Pro X Ultra-P3-H3 with Baseplate and Haptic Reactor Set, which are
very popular on various websites but there is no clear video showing the
product and how it works. I hope you can read the proposal and come to an
agreement of mutual interest. It's a pleasure to talk to you.


*Prepared by:*
*Christian Conde/Agustin Conde – TecnoCardales*
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@ChristianConde1976
Argentina
*Date:* 30/11/25
------------------------------
*1. Introduction*

TecnoCardales is pleased to present this proposal for the production
of a *professional
video review* of the *Simsonn Pro X Ultra-P3-H3 with Baseplate and Haptic
Reactor Set*.
Our objective is to create high-quality content that showcases the
product’s performance, setup, and user experience in a clear and engaging
way, optimized for YouTube and social media audiences.

This collaboration aims to give Simsonn increased visibility, honest
product feedback, and premium audiovisual material suitable for marketing
and communication.
------------------------------
*2. Scope of Work* *2.1. Video Content Structure*

The video will cover the following categories:

   1.

   *Unboxing* of the product
   2.

   *Explanation* of what the product is and what it includes
   3.

   *Mounting the device* on the included Baseplate
   4.

   *Mounting inside a customized cockpit*
   5.

   *Configuration and setup* for PC use
   6.

   *Real-use testing* and practical demonstrations
   7.

   *Final impressions:* performance, feel, strengths, and general
   conclusions

*Language:*

   -

   Primary language: *Spanish*
   -

   Optional English version: produced by TecnoCardales’ in-house translator

*Video Length:*

Determined naturally by the development of all listed categories.
------------------------------
*2.2. Platforms*

The final video will be published on the following platforms:

   -

   *YouTube (main platform)*
   -

   *Instagram* (adapted versions)
   -

   *TikTok* (short-form versions)

Simsonn will also receive a downloadable copy of the content for internal
use.
------------------------------
*3. Timeline*

   -

   Production and editing: *15 to 30 days* after TecnoCardales receives the
   product.
   -

   Review period for Simsonn: *7 calendar days* from delivery of the draft
   version.
   -

   Revisions completed within *3 to 7 days*, depending on complexity.

------------------------------
*4. Revisions*

Simsonn may request up to *5 revisions* at no extra cost.
Additional revisions may incur an extra fee depending on the nature of the
requested change.
------------------------------
*5. Product Handling*

The product supplied for review will be:

*Simsonn Pro X Ultra-P3-H3 with Baseplate and Haptic Reactor Set*

   -

   The product will be sent to TecnoCardales.
   -

   It will *remain in the possession of TecnoCardales* after the video is
   completed.
   -

   It *may be counted as part of the payment*, depending on the final
   agreement between both parties.

------------------------------
*6. Intellectual Property & Usage Rights*

   -

   All video content produced by *Christian Conde / TecnoCardales*
remains *exclusively
   owned* by TecnoCardales.
   -

   Simsonn may request revisions but does not own the content.
   -

   If Simsonn wishes to use *excerpts or clips* of the video, prior notice
   must be given and an *additional fee may apply* depending on usage.
   -

   Full credit will be given as follows:
   -

      *Video produced by TecnoCardales / Christian Conde*
      -

      *Product provided by Simsonn*

------------------------------
*7. Budget & Payment Terms*

Final pricing will be discussed and mutually agreed upon by Simsonn and
TecnoCardales.
The product provided may serve as *partial or full payment*, based on
negotiations.

Payment method, currency, and schedule will be defined upon acceptance of
this proposal.
------------------------------
*8. Legal Framework*

TecnoCardales operates in *Argentina*, and therefore the production,
policies, and any related agreement will be governed by the laws of
the *Republic
of Argentina*, unless both parties agree otherwise.
------------------------------
*9. Acceptance*

This proposal outlines the scope, responsibilities, and general conditions
for the collaboration.
Once approved by Simsonn, a formal contract can be prepared to finalize the
agreement.
------------------------------
We appreciate the opportunity to collaborate with Simsonn.

If you require additions, adjustments, or more details, we are fully
available to refine this proposal.
-- 
Agustín Conde / TecnoCardales

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 8106 中
